Hoboken.Castle Point Anime Convention: Castle Point Anime Convention (abbreviated as CPAC) is an annual two-day anime convention held on the campus of Stevens Institute of Technology in Hoboken, New Jersey, and operated by an undergraduate student organization: the Stevens Anime Club. The convention is held in late March or April, and focuses on Japanese comics and animation and its fandom. Founded in 2008 with 693 attendees, the event attracted 4,516 attendees in 2015.
